website_summaries.verdict: Dark circles lighten with regular use. It reduces puffiness and wrinkles as well.
pros: We give this gel a thumbs up for being effective on a range of skin types
it's suitable for consumers 20 and up
cons: Not very effective for hereditary dark circles plus some say it dried their skin

customer_reviews.title: I always buy from their original website or Sephora and its like double the price 🤔 Just started using it
customer_reviews.text: I’m curious why it’s so cheap on amazon. I always buy from their original website or Sephora and its like double the price 🤔 Just started using it, hopefully it’s original and will work as the one from their site because I absolutely love this eye gel ❤️ I get those puffy eyes in the mornings since teenage years, when I use this gel morning / evening no puffy eyes! If I stop using it I get them back, lol. So just doing my morning / evening routine and I wake up flawless every morning 😁
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I`ve been using it daily (every morning, after washing my face) for about 6 weeks now and even though I haven`t seen any reduction in my under eye circles this gel feels nice and cool when putting on (sometimes I put it on my eye lid too...very cooling effect). What`s also important is that it works very well with my make up (I use Bare Minerals) and under eye concealer (I use the Clarins Instant Concealer). Does not dry up whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: kb101

customer_reviews.title: feels good on the skin
customer_reviews.text: very light weight gel. feels good on the skin, after skin absorbs it leaves a dewy finish on the skin which makes your under eye look a little more pronounced. tried to pat it in more but didn't make much difference. i wish it leaves a matte finish instead.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Huang

customer_reviews.title: Didn't see any improvement of my under eye puffiness and/or ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't see any improvement of my under eye puffiness and/or dark circles. It was also a little drying. It did not irritate my skin or cause any problems. I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: The best eye cream
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for two years now, cant live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products for pufiness eyes. That is why I keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: TOM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive eyes and this does the trick every time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always wake up with puffy eyes, this makes them ...
customer_reviews.text: Always wake up with puffy eyes, this makes them disappear!!! Keep it in the refridgerater for a little extra cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see any difference in my under eye bags or circles
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Clarins forever...
customer_reviews.text: A must especially when traveling, calm the surrounding of the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream. Only one that has worked so far in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best product on the market for me. Using Clarins for 25 years, never lets me down.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie P.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the item has been open , it has been used and only half left , Why ??
customer_reviews.author: shiming zhang

customer_reviews.title: Used This Quality Product for Many years
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this product years ago by a friend and have used it steadily ever since. Yes, it is expensive, as quality costs more. However, it works well and is a huge improvement over other creams and gels supposedly meant to do the same thing. This product is light, refreshing and can be used sparingly with good results. I honestly have never found another product that works as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stephen Browning

customer_reviews.title: Clarins long time client
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this eye gel for 25 years. I’ve tried other brands but always return to Clarins. I apply this directly after washing my face, dap my eyes and make my coffee. It’s my morning ritual.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. D.

customer_reviews.title: Bags Be Gone
customer_reviews.text: Just use a pea drop under each eye and rub in for a few seconds. Noticable results after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Keep getting compliments about how happy I look
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for most of this year and can see a change in the eye area of my face. I'm 72 years old and it works for me. Keep getting compliments about how happy I look. We all know that the eyes speak.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Jones

customer_reviews.title: This contour gel feels nice and cool under the eyes in the morning
customer_reviews.text: This contour gel feels nice and cool under the eyes in the morning. It isn't a miracle worker but does help.
customer_reviews.author: oe

customer_reviews.title: Helps de-puff under eye bags
customer_reviews.text: This is my third/fourth repurchase (can't remember). It's worked the best so far for puffiness, not so much dark circles. But overall consistently good product.
customer_reviews.author: AlinaD

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like a brand new product so I am disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time, but the box (that the product is in) arrived open and there was someone's hair inside. Doesn't look like a brand new product so I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S Versaggi
